programme.desc: Two strangers embark on a road trip across the US to partake in a scientist's radical experiment which appears to prove an afterlife. Comedy sci-fi, starring Katie Parker, Rahul Kohli, Gavin Powers, Joe Powers and Karen Gillan Mali Elfman - Director Katie Parker - Rose Rahul Kohli - Teddy Karen Gillan - Dr Stevensen Rose McIver - Heather Tongayi Chirisa - Father Jack Tim Griffin - John Nico Evers-Swindell - Nick.

programme.title: Lamborghini: The Man Behind The Legend
programme.desc: Tractor-manufacturer Ferruccio Lamborghini moves on to creating military vehicles during the Second World War before designing and building the classic cars that defined his legacy. Writer/director Robert Moresco's drama, starring Frank Grillo, Mira Sorvino and Gabriel Byrne Bobby Moresco - Director Frank Grillo - Ferruccio Lamborghini Mira Sorvino - Annita Gabriel Byrne - Enzo Ferrari Eliana Jones - Billie Alland Giorgio Cantarini - Giorgio Lamborghini.

programme.title: Ride the Eagle
programme.desc: A man is left with a conditional inheritance when his estranged mother dies. Before he can move into her picturesque Yosemite cabin, he has to complete her elaborate to-do list, which includes getting in touch with the girl who got away. Comedy drama, starring Jake Johnson, Susan Sarandon and JK Simmons Trent O'Donnell - Director Jake Johnson - Leif Susan Sarandon - Honey D'Arcy Carden - Audrey J K Simmons - Carl Luis Fernandez-Gil - Gorka.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic Dinosaurs
programme.desc: What's your favourite dinosaur? From Jurassic Park's Brachiosaurus to Jurassic World's Mosasaurus, join us as we look at some of the best dinosaurs from Spielberg's iconic franchise.

programme.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Crime/detective, Sci Fi, Children's ║ 2022 ║ U
programme.desc: Young Gru attends an interview to join a diabolical dream team christened the Vicious 6, but Belle Bottom, Jean-Clawed, Nun-chuck, Svengeance and Stronghold cruelly dismiss the boy. In retaliation for the ageist snub, the resourceful tyke steals an ancient amulet that can harness the power of the 12 creatures of the Chinese zodiac. Animated comedy prequel, featuring the voices of Steve Carell, Alan Arkin, Taraji P Henson and Jean-Claude Van Damme Kyle Balda - Director Brad Ableson - Co director Jonathan del Val - Co director Steve Carell - Gru Taraji P Henson - Belle Bottom Michelle Yeoh - Master Chow RZA - Otto Jean-Claude Van Damme - Jean Clawed Lucy Lawless - Nunchuk Dolph Lundgren - Svengeance Danny Trejo - Stronghold Russell Brand - Dr Nefario Julie Andrews - Marlena Gru Alan Arkin - Wild Knuckles Pierre Coffin - Kevin / Stuart / Bob / Minions.

programme.title: Beast
programme.desc: Dr Nate Samuels, a recently widowed father and his teenage daughters, Meredith and Norah, find their holiday at a South African nature reserve turns into a nightmare when they are hunted by a massive rogue lion in the savanna. Director Baltasar Kormákur's action thriller, starring Idris Elba, Sharlto Copley, Leah Jeffries and Iyana Halley Baltasar Kormakur - Director Idris Elba - Dr Nate Samuels Sharlto Copley - Martin Battles Iyana Halley - Meredith Samuels Leah Jeffries - Norah Samuels.

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Nearly 5,000 years after he was bestowed with powers of Egyptian gods, a former slave is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world. Fantasy adventure based on the DC Comics character, starring Dwayne Johnson, Aldis Hodge and Pierce Brosnan Jaume Collet-Serra - Director Dwayne Johnson - Black Adam Pierce Brosnan - Kent Nelson / Dr Fate Sarah Shahi - Adrianna Tomaz Aldis Hodge - Carter Hall / Hawkman Noah Centineo - Al Rothstein / Atom Smasher Quintessa Swindell - Maxine Hunkel / Cyclone Viola Davis - Amanda Waller.

programme.title: Elvis
programme.sub-title: Romance, Drama, Music, Arts And Culture, Musical, Documentary And Factual ║ 2022 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Gospel-loving singer Elvis Presley witnesses America's bitter racial divisions while continuing to support performers such as BB King and Little Richard. Falling under the spell of teenager Priscilla, he builds a home at Graceland for his parents. However, while manager Colonel Tom Parker exerts a grip over his talented asset, Elvis must choose between fame and family. Baz Luhrmann's biopic, starring Austin Butler, Tom Hanks and Olivia DeJonge Baz Luhrmann - Director Austin Butler - Elvis Presley Tom Hanks - Colonel Tom Parker Olivia DeJonge - Priscilla Presley Helen Thomson - Gladys Presley Richard Roxburgh - Vernon Presley Kelvin Harrison Jr - BB King David Wenham - Hank Snow Kodi Smit-McPhee - Jimmie Rodgers Snow Luke Bracey - Jerry Schilling Dacre Montgomery - Steve Binder Leon Ford - Tom Diskin Gary Clark Jr - Arthur \Big Boy\ Crudup Yola - Sister Rosetta Tharpe Natasha Bassett - Dixie Locke Xavier Samuel - Scotty Moore.

programme.title: 80 for Brady
programme.desc: Friends Lou, Trish, Betty and Maura are devoted fans of the same American football team - the New England Patriots. A radio show runs a competition to win tickets to the forthcoming Super Bowl between the Patriots and the Atlanta Falcons. When the quartet win, they embark on a road trip. Comedy, starring Lily Tomlin, Jane Fonda, Rita Moreno and Sally Field Kyle Marvin - Director Lily Tomlin - Lou Jane Fonda - Trish Rita Moreno - Maura Sally Field - Betty Tom Brady (2) - Tom Brady Harry Hamlin - Dan Bob Balaban - Mark Glynn Turman - Mickey Jimmy O Yang - Tony.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: A man who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around. Comedy drama, starring Tom Hanks, Mariana Trevino and Rachel Keller Marc Forster - Director Tom Hanks - Otto Mariana Treviño - Marisol Rachel Keller - Sonya Manuel Garcia-Rulfo - Tommy Truman Hanks - Young Otto Mike Birbiglia - Dye & Merica Real Estate Agent.

programme.title: The Silent Twins
programme.desc: June is born 10 minutes before her twin Jennifer, but the younger child is the dominant personality at home in 1960s Haverfordwest. The girls refuse to engage verbally with the rest of the family. As they enter teenagehood, June and Jennifer nurture a mutual obsession with hellraising local lad Wayne. Fact-based drama, starring Letitia Wright and Tamara Lawrance Agnieszka Smoczynska - Director Letitia Wright - June Gibbons Tamara Lawrance - Jennifer Gibbons Jodhi May - Marjorie Wallace Michael Smiley - Tim Thomas Nadine Marshall - Gloria Gibbons Treva Etienne - Aubrey Gibbons Jack Bandeira - Wayne Kennedy.

programme.title: Little Dixie
programme.desc: Left to fend for himself after the breakdown of a truce between a governor and a drug cartel, Doc, a special forces veteran, must protect the one untainted thing in his life - his daughter, Little Dixie. programme.title: A Thousand And One
programme.desc: Inez de la Paz serves time at Rikers Island and returns home to New York. programme.title: Renfield

programme.title: A Thousand And One
programme.desc: Inez de la Paz serves time at Rikers Island and returns home to New York. Her six-year-old son Terry has been placed in foster care in her absence but when he has an accident, Inez spirits Terry out of the foster care system without permission and raises her boy under a different name. programme.title: Renfield
programme.desc: For more than 100 years, Robert Montague Renfield has been at the beck and call of his manipulative master, Count Dracula. programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Action, Comedy, Crime/detective, Mystery ║ 2001 ║ 12
programme.desc: Martial arts thriller, starring Jackie Chan as a salesman at a exercise equipment store, who has dreams of living a more adventurous life. programme.title: The Ashes 1st Test Day 1 Hlts
programme.desc: The first Test of the 2023 Ashes begins with day one at Edgbaston. Captained by Ben Stokes, England begin their quest to regain the urn, with their last series win coming in 2015. (16.06).

programme.title: The Ashes 1st Test Day 2 Hlts
programme.desc: On day two of the first men's Ashes Test at Edgbaston, Australia return to the crease chasing England's first-innings total of 393 that included an unbeaten Joe Root century. (17.06).

programme.title: The Ashes 1st Test Day 3 Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of the first Ashes Test at Edgbaston. With England's lead cut to 82 by stumps yesterday, Australia and Usman Khawaja return to the crease closing in on the hosts' total. (18.06).

programme.title: The Ashes 1st Test Day 4 Hlts
programme.desc: England resume their second innings on day four of the first Ashes Test leading by 35 runs. On a rain-hit day three at Edgbaston, Australia claimed the wickets of England's openers. (19.06).

programme.title: The Ashes 1st Test Day 5 Hlts
programme.desc: The fifth and final day of the first Test between England and Australia at Edgbaston, as the 2023 men's Ashes continues. (20.06).

programme.desc: The opening day of the second men's Ashes Test between England and Australia at Lord's. (28.06).

programme.title: The Ashes 2nd Test Day 2 Hlts
programme.desc: Day two of the second men's Ashes Test between England and Australia at Lord's. The tourists resume on 339-5 having dominated day one, with Warner, Smith and Head all passing 50. (29.06).

programme.title: The Ashes 2nd Test Day 3 Hlts
programme.desc: On a pivotal day in the second men's Ashes Test and the series as a whole, England resume play trailing Australia by 138 runs with Harry Brook and Ben Stokes at the crease. (30.06).

programme.title: The Ashes 2nd Test Day 4 Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the second men's Ashes Test between England and Australia at Lord's. At the resumption of play, the tourists lead by 221 runs with eight second-innings wickets in hand. (01.07).

programme.title: The Ashes 2nd Test Day 5 Hlts
programme.desc: The fifth and final day of the second men's Ashes Test at Lord's. Chasing Australia's total of 371, England resume on 114-4 targeting an improbable victory to level the series. (02.07).
